Simple techniques can be used to great effect, such as writing letters with a fountain pen, using an old, worn notebook, coffee to stain paper, and embellishing clothing with fake blood.

What can be used to show locations and people in a scenario?
Photographs of the period in which the scenario is set can be used to show locations and people.
